text:
@SteveRustad1 Dear Steve,

Obama & Hillary let those Heroes Die in Benghazi without lifting a finger to help, then lied to the American People.

Trump has no control over Covid-19 & has done as well as anyone could have given the same circumstances.

What in your mind, would Dems do different?
